column4: I want to know how to connect to a windows computer through a wireless network using samba?

set up a share on the windows box.  set linux box to have same 'workgroup' as the windwos box in /etc/samba/smb.conf and if the pc's can ping each other via ip. the gnome file manager should be able to connect to 'smb://windowsmachinename/sharename' or be shown in the network browser.
so it should have the same workgroup? I can ping the other computer using ip but smbclient can't find it when I query it for workgroups
should I also use domain logons = yes ?
